CSS Selectors Game - Mexico Diner

Rules
  • Write in the "CSS Editor" window the code how to refer to the moving element
  • Press the ENTER key
  • If the answer is correct, you move on to the next level
  • Levels can be switched on the right
  • If you don't know the solution - press the HELP button
